title: RIOT CAN YOU PLEASE FIX THIS

replies.body: This error can happen if bugsplat fails to get logs for you.  Assuming this happened during champion select or after, the cause might be a network issue struggling to stay connect to the server.  To rule out some possibilities on that, run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Test it in a custom to prevent penalties, and let me know the results.
